forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 60, with temperatures falling to around 58 in the afternoon. South southwest wind 2 to 10 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 46. West southwest wind 2 to 8 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, a pleasant clarity envelops the city this morning, heralded by a gentle sun warming the skyline and inviting wanderers to embrace the day. Despite the high temperature hovering around 60 degrees, you will find that the air retains a crisp quality, a reminder that the maritime chill, though subdued, lingers close. As afternoon settles in, expect temperatures to dip slightly to around 58, accompanied by a soft south-southwest breeze whispering through the streets. 

As the sun arcs across the sky, the horizon remains clear, revealing the majestic outline of the Golden Gate and the vibrant buildings of the city. While the marine layer dances at the periphery, attempting to gather for its evening return, today promises ample sun with only a hint of the fog that often blankets the bay. For those venturing out, a light jacket will suffice against the evening coolness, ideal for a stroll along the waterfront or perhaps a quiet afternoon spent in one of the city’s many parks. The charm of this day beckons those who appreciate the arts of simple pleasure—be it sipping coffee on a sun-drenched terrace or perusing the local boutiques, letting each moment unfurl in sweet serenity.
